article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: The only reason the Obama administration has to withhold these documents is if they show the IRS's decision-making was not reasoned -- or if the reason they wrote this regulation was a desire to skirt the law.
og.title: The Halbig Subpoena
